name: Suez One
description: Suez One is an original Hebrew and Latin display serif typeface with a single weight. The Hebrew design for a modern serif is inspired by Hebrew calligraphy. It is intended for use in headline and display typography that needs a strong contemporary style. The Suez project is led by Michal Sahar, a type designer based in Tel Aviv, Israel. To contribute, see github.com/MichalSahar/Suez
author: Michal Sahar
